Multiple classes can be added to an element by listing them in the `class` attribute and separating them with a space. For example, the following adds both the `animal` and `dog` classes to a `div` element. ```html
``` If you add multiple classes to an HTML element, the styles of the first classes you list may be overridden by later classes.
